website_summaries.verdict: Extra moisturizing formula and tropical scent for a spa-like experience.
pros: Shea butter along with coconut and lime extracts help moisturize skin
The tropical scent will relax your mind, helping you unwind physically and emotionally
cons: The fragrance might be too strong for some people

customer_reviews.title: This appears to be all natural, as it has ...
customer_reviews.text: This appears to be all natural, as it has organic shea butter and mango pulp, but it's not. It has added fragrance, which is generally an endocrine disruptor. This is unhealthy for anyone, but especially dangerous for pregnant or nursing women, children, etc. I opened it before noticing, so the whole thing is unfortunately going in the trash.
customer_reviews.author: faelight

customer_reviews.title: Smells great, not too strong
customer_reviews.text: I saw alot of reviews about people complaining of the smell being too strong. I was worried when I ordered it but I can safely say those people are crazy. Smells great, not too strong.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great scent and soothing effect
customer_reviews.text: Scent is a love it or hate it feeling. I like this. I love the scent of lime and coconut and this works for me. I don't use anywhere near the amount specified; maybe that's why I don't find it overwhelming. I bought it at the grocery store for years but, since I moved to a different city, that wasn't an option any longer. Amazon has it, it ships quickly, and it's competitively priced. I'll keep buying it.
customer_reviews.author: Bryant Pierpont

customer_reviews.title: Great Smell
customer_reviews.text: I love the Coconut Lime smell. The aroma really smells good in my bathroom and drifts into the bedroom. I find this epsom salt to be very calming in addition to helping with aching muscles. I also have the body scrub and the lotion of the same brand as well. I absolutely love these products!!!
customer_reviews.author: Penelope W.

customer_reviews.title: Smells Great
customer_reviews.text: When I opened the bag, the salt had an amazing aroma that smelled great. The salt moisturizes the same as the other salts I have used. As far as value goes, I feel that it is about equal from the placed salts that can be purchased. My biggest take from this product is that the scent is really nice.
customer_reviews.author: D. Wilkow

customer_reviews.title: Smells heavenly and makes your skin so soft
customer_reviews.text: Omg, if I could eat these I would. The bath salts smell amazing and they are super moisturizing. Usually bath salts that claim to be moisturizing leave a film on your skin or in the tub. These didn't make me feel greasy at all, my skin just felt soft and it smelled heavenly. I wanted to soak in that tub for forever. My body felt really relaxed after and I'm very happy with this purchase. You'll want to use at least a cup of the salts, depending on the size of your tub. You can also use these in a footbath!
customer_reviews.author: Movieluver

customer_reviews.title: Stinks
customer_reviews.text: I don't understand how this has so many positive reviews. The smell is terrible. (I tried both the mango and the coconut lime.) I used it once, and the rest will go on the garbage. I wish I could get my money back.
customer_reviews.author: LisaWS21

customer_reviews.title: Good product and good price
customer_reviews.text: This is the first type of bath salts I’ve ever tried. I was nervous about my skin breaking out with acne or eczema or getting a UTI from sitting in it but none of that happened! It makes a nice fizzing sensation when first put in the water but that’s about it. Didn’t dry out my skin. Great for exfoliating. Scent is definitely there but not too strong.
customer_reviews.author: Kbiggs

customer_reviews.title: Fresh scent, moisturizing & relaxing!
customer_reviews.text: Love this scent. This is my second purchase of Tree Hut Coconut Lime. I used to use Village Natural White Tea & Jasmine but they don't make it anymore. I tried this, I really like the scent so I ordered more and I think the price is great too.
customer_reviews.author: L-Ditty

customer_reviews.title: Smells Fantastic
customer_reviews.text: I do my own pedicures and use this to soak my feet. I love the way it smells. It dissolves quickly in the water and after using it my feet feel refreshed. I might try more products from this company.
customer_reviews.author: Mares

customer_reviews.title: Worth Every Penny!
customer_reviews.text: I have been trying inexpensive ways to get the spa feel at home. Order this not expecting much, and was overwhelmingly surprised with the quality. Feet were noticeably softer and the smell was pleasant- not overpowering or too fruity. It’s been half a week since use, and my feet are still super soft. Would buy again and have already recommended it to friends and family.
customer_reviews.author: Me

customer_reviews.title: Smells so good and leaves your skin so soft!
customer_reviews.text: This epsom salt smells so good and is so relaxing. It leaves your skin feeling so soft and smelling so good. You do not need to use a large amount, so this bag will last a long time if you do not take a bath every day. My only complaint is that the "zip lock" closure doesn't seal very well, but they sent it in another bag which does seal nicely. Overall I'm extremely happy with this purchase and will order it again!
customer_reviews.author: Jillian L.

customer_reviews.title: A relaxing spa in your own home!
customer_reviews.text: Wow! Wow! Ahhhhh... A spa in a bag Smells incredible! Soothing bath for any aches and pains Makes my skin softer than it has ever been I was not a big bath person before - but this makes me want to soak forever I find I am in a great mood & relaxed after using Very affordable Have given 3-4 as gift * does not reseal - but no biggie - just use a rubber band or clip Coconut scent is perfect
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful Scent, Doesn't Dry Out Skin
customer_reviews.text: This is great for a foot soak! My feet are always dry and flakey but this salt really softens them up and doesn't dry them out. I use this salt in my foot bath, then when I'm finished, I scrub off all the dead skin with a lufa (comes off very easily after using this salt), pat dry, and put on a little lotion with socks. And let me tell you: the coconut like scent is HEAVENLY.
customer_reviews.author: mishpelle

customer_reviews.title: LO-CO FOR COCO MOISTURE !
customer_reviews.text: I've tried these and the mango, as well, the coconut/lime being my absolute FAV!! I recently tried the mango and found it substantially less moisturizing and the scent was very strong and artificial smelling. This has a wonderful, light scent that is relaxing, yet invigorating at he same time. My bathroom continues to smell like a mini tropical cocktail even after the water is down the drain. Leaves my skin so and hydrated. I will never be without!
customer_reviews.author: andrea

customer_reviews.title: A MUST have for sore muscles or pregnancy
customer_reviews.text: Been looking everywhere for an epsom salt soak that was NOT lavender or floral. This is a must have. It mixes really well with bubble bath if that is something you want. The scent is fantastic. It is not drying and so soothing. I ordered the mango to try next. I am so sad--I think they are sold out of this one. I will keep a watch for it. Fantastic product for a fantastic price. Helps me create my own spa.....
customer_reviews.author: N.B. Schwartz

customer_reviews.title: Skeptic turned believer.
customer_reviews.text: Overall, I give this 5 stars. I was extremely skeptical this would even work for back aches but low and behold it proved me wrong. I've been taking hot baths everyday for the last week trying to solve my back ache and this was the ingredient that was missing. Sensational product for the price. Will buy again
customer_reviews.author: Mr Anderson

customer_reviews.title: Soothing
customer_reviews.text: Love the smell of this epsom salt. I have some health issues that have required me to take more baths than showers, and I decided to get this to make the bath a little more soothing. I can't say I've noticed my skin being more moisturized, but I do take very hot baths so it is possible that if I lowered the temp the Epsom salt would be more moisturizing.
customer_reviews.author: L! $@

customer_reviews.title: Love this product
customer_reviews.text: Love this product; it smells good, it absorbs quickly in water and is so soothing for my back pain I can't get out of tub. The only complaint I have is it arrived open with a slit on top of bag (like a box cutter cut through it). I want to order this regularly if this problem can be fixed.
customer_reviews.author: Duncan Cox

customer_reviews.title: Great smell
customer_reviews.text: We get this all the time as it has a nice scent that isn't over powering like others and does leave your skin feeling a bit softer. The packaging is getting better each time we get it so that is a plus. It does help sore tired feet or muscles after a long say of work or gym session. Would recommend it is a good product for a good price
customer_reviews.author: A. Miller

customer_reviews.title: Buy it!😍
customer_reviews.text: I used this for the first time the other day and the smell alone had me sold immediately. I take salt baths regularly to clean my spiritual body so to speak. It has this amazing and relaxing mango spa smell. 😍 it moisturized my skin and made my hot bath a therapeutic and pleasant experience with the fresh mango scent.
customer_reviews.author: Amazonian😍

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: A must have! It makes the whole house smell amazing when we soak our feet. It's also great for freeing toxins, athlete's feet, stinky feet, any type of feet!
customer_reviews.author: Amy M.

customer_reviews.title: Smells Divine
customer_reviews.text: I love this scented Epsom salt. The fragrance is long lasting but not overpowering. I bought this to use for an at-home spa experience with my foot spa for pedicures. It's wonderful. This product softens my feet and leaves them lightly fragrances. The only con for me was the packaging. It's pretty and is resealable but it ripped entirely open very easily.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa H.

customer_reviews.title: It’s ok
customer_reviews.text: I like the scent and I think the price is good but I probably will go back to Dr.Teals. I didn’t feel like it helped my sore muscles. I usually soak for 20-40 minutes depending on how much time I have and The salts disappeared almost immediately. Dr. Teals takes a little while to dissolve. It’s definitely an ok product but I might not buy again.
customer_reviews.author: John haggart

customer_reviews.title: Smells AMAZING
customer_reviews.text: First time purchasing this... love it! Smells AMAZING... like, "if I could only smell one scent for the rest of my life, it would be this" kind of scent. Moisturizes great too. Worth the price...a little goes a long way. New favorite... obviously:)
customer_reviews.author: Stacey C.

customer_reviews.title: Very moisturizing!!
customer_reviews.text: These are the most moisturizing Epsom salts I’ve ever used! Now I’m spoiled & won’t ever go back to the drug store brands. The scent is really nice too & not too overbearing. Even my husband has started using them.
customer_reviews.author: britt foster

customer_reviews.title: Great scent, great product!
customer_reviews.text: Used this for an at home pedicure with my boo, mixed in the salt with warm water in a tub then followed by soaking my feet and using one of Tree Hut’s salt scrubs which made our feel feel EXTRA soft. Loved it and it smelled amazing, usually I’m not a fan of strong scents but this one smells so fresh and tropical.
customer_reviews.author: Alissa

customer_reviews.title: Best Epsom Salt EVER!!!
customer_reviews.text: The most wonderful smelling epsom salts ever!!! I ordered the tropical mango as well and smells just as amazing. Already ordered 4 bags and will be back for more.
customer_reviews.author: Mamaz Salez

customer_reviews.title: Great in the bath tub
customer_reviews.text: I have used this everyday since I received it. I love the smell of this while taking a bath it's a great product and my skin is so soft
customer_reviews.author: Jackie

customer_reviews.title: Didn't even get to try it
customer_reviews.text: The salt arrived all over the bottom of the box and as well as the other items in the box because there was a large box cutter slit across the bag.
customer_reviews.author: Liz

customer_reviews.title: Love it, the Smell and Ease of Aches and Pains
customer_reviews.text: This is good stuff! I just used it for my bath and my muscles feel much more relaxed than if I had not used this product. I love the smell, cheap price esp considering the amount you get. Will be buying this product a long time to come.
customer_reviews.author: Shycovian

customer_reviews.title: Mango
customer_reviews.text: Amazing scent. It smells the place up Ina great way.the smell is mango for sure. It releases great things from my bfs feet. He's feel hurt and it works great
customer_reviews.author: Tina M Wickizer

customer_reviews.title: Great value.
customer_reviews.text: I soak my feet in this and they're softer, pain free, and help remove all the issues.
customer_reviews.author: CMG

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Smells heavenly, like a warm summer day. The amount for the price is fantastic! Dissolves nicely in warm water. Left my skin feeling soft and hydrated. The scent lingers in a nice way on the skin.
customer_reviews.author: Lin

customer_reviews.title: HEAVEN IN A BAG!!!!!!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Let me say this!! The smell is SOMETHING ELSE! And I mean that as a matter of fact!!! I wish I could find a body wash/ moisturizer/ body cream/ and body spray with this scent! It's that real ladies!!! Oh yea and it works like a CHARM
customer_reviews.author: Shopaholic 🔑

customer_reviews.title: Great epsom salt !
customer_reviews.text: I loooove this epsom salt. It smells so good you almost want to eat it (don't !) It is a great addition to any relaxing bath, or even for soaking one's feet. Try it and you won't be sorry
customer_reviews.author: Chippy

customer_reviews.title: Good Lord: Scent is too strong
customer_reviews.text: I had high hopes for this product. It was so strong it gave me a headache which lead to a migraine. If your sensitive to strong perfumey smells like I am: AVOID. My mom liked it though.
customer_reviews.author: N W

customer_reviews.title: I love how good it makes me feel.
customer_reviews.text: This is my one relief for my achy feet at the end of a double. It’s moisturizing and scent also ease my muscle joints while releasing stress. Best brand I have used and I have tried several.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa83

customer_reviews.title: THE SCENT IS OVER 9000!
customer_reviews.text: Ugh! You guys! Listen! The smell of this is AMAZING! I got the coconut lime (I thought there was another one), and the smell alone is so relaxing. I will say I feel more moisturized than when I use regular bath salts, but even if I didn't, this was an addition I think I will keep around for my relaxing bath routine!
customer_reviews.author: Giada Elizabeth

customer_reviews.title: Foot soaking
customer_reviews.text: We used for foot soaking. This product had a great smell. It didn’t quiet smell like mangos to me, maybe a really superficial mango. Overall we loved it for the price and it’s ability moisturize our feet.
customer_reviews.author: MoStyle

customer_reviews.title: Good but not the best
customer_reviews.text: Overall a good epsom salt but there are better ones -- including scent.
customer_reviews.author: Cipher 8

customer_reviews.title: Amazing
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely amazing smells so nice and is so soothing and made my dry sore feet feel like a million bucks. And it's made in the USA! I will be buying this again for sure.
customer_reviews.author: Slayer I45

customer_reviews.title: Love This
customer_reviews.text: Smells great, really does help relax and relieve sore muscles. Dissolves easily and makes my whole bathroom smell wonderful while it's filling. I'm buying this regularly now. Even my husband is using it!
customer_reviews.author: CAG - NC

customer_reviews.title: My Fav!
customer_reviews.text: This is my favorite scented Epsom bath salt. I take a bath about once per week and I love the scent while relaxing. I also appreciate that it doesn’t leave a film, sentiment, or crap in the tub so cleaning is never a problem.
customer_reviews.author: Jamison

customer_reviews.title: Smells Amazing
customer_reviews.text: This epson salt came very quickly and the scent did not let me down!! It smells absolutely amazing!! It also doesn't loose its scent when put in water. Made my skin so soft!!
customer_reviews.author: Kirsten

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely love the scent
customer_reviews.text: Great product for this value. This scent is amazing. Bath relaxes greatly, and you will love foot soak with this salt. It really gets the dead skin soaked off. All you have to do is to scrub it off with whatever tool you are using for your feet.
customer_reviews.author: Anna Horuk

customer_reviews.title: I look forward to yoga class so I can soak afterwards!
customer_reviews.text: The smell is AMAZING and it works really well. I’m not much of a bath person but my joints don’t agree so after activities I need to soak and this is making it much more enjoyable!
customer_reviews.author: Jess W

customer_reviews.title: Not the smell I expected
customer_reviews.text: The smell is amazing at first but the natural smell becomes perfume like. I was disappointed. I did have this on auto ship but I am going to cancel my subscription.
customer_reviews.author: M. Sullivan

customer_reviews.title: Got Me Through the Winter!
customer_reviews.text: The natural, tropical fragrance and the shea moisture in these epsom salts got me through the winter! Kept my skin from drying out and fragrance is relaxing.
customer_reviews.author: Nukegrrrl

customer_reviews.title: Smells wonderful & so relaxing!
customer_reviews.text: These salts make a bath 10x better! I bust my butt in a warehouse all night, 5-7 nights a week so some mornings when i get home; i love to soak the stiffness away. Great product to help unwind & relax.
customer_reviews.author: Shane & Cheyy

customer_reviews.title: Great scent
customer_reviews.text: I love how this Epsom salt smells, I wish they would sell it in a larger bulk size! Salt crystals are small and dissolve very easily. No glass like salt crystals stabbing when you move in the tub!
customer_reviews.author: Nick Capone

customer_reviews.title: Great soothing effect and exquisite scent
customer_reviews.text: Love the scent and its effect on the skin. It smoothed my dry skin in only one bath and created a very soft sensation, while providing an exquisite scent. I highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Pienaluna

customer_reviews.title: Happy camper!
customer_reviews.text: I work night shift standing on my feet all night and I my body takes a beating so I tried epson salt, I tried all types of body soaks all it does is dry out your skin. This one has a nice sent moistures your skin and I LOVE it.
customer_reviews.author: Tiffany

customer_reviews.title: Great for relaxing
customer_reviews.text: Epsom salt has a nice scent, but I don't think it's overpowering. After an hour long bath my skin was really soft and smooth. I would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Lightbell

customer_reviews.title: good bath product
customer_reviews.text: nice scent. not sure about moisturizing as it is added to a hot soaking tub. like packaging as it keeps moisture out & easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Big Hard Clumps
customer_reviews.text: Big HARD clumps in package when I received it. Even beating it on the counter will not break up.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Most invigorating!
customer_reviews.text: Love this! Smells wonderful and gave me a spa like-like experience! It performed all the benefits it stated and the moisture-retention was great! Will definitely buy again and again.
customer_reviews.author: Carla Williams

customer_reviews.title: Better in the bag than in the bath.
customer_reviews.text: Good deal for the price. Would have rated higher but the scent of lime and coconut in the bag does not translate well to the bath. Unless maybe you used the whole bag and then it would not be cost effective. Either way,,,, disappointed but not terribly. The price was right.
customer_reviews.author: PK

customer_reviews.title: Dissolves well and smells heavenly
customer_reviews.text: Smells great and the powder is very fine so it dissolves well. No sitting down to a sharp piece of salt on your butt! Love it
customer_reviews.author: Tracie Higgins

customer_reviews.title: Good product, good value.
customer_reviews.text: I am very scent-sensitive and these do not bother me- I actually like the scent. Great value for the money and give me and my achy pregnant body extra comfort and soothing in the tub.
customer_reviews.author: Excited State

customer_reviews.title: I didn't know it was scented
customer_reviews.text: My fault for not reading fully but it wasn't even like a real herbal smell just one of those synthetic scents that smell toxic.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality of the bag
customer_reviews.text: No a good bad. Opened once and it wont close again. Kind of important for this product
customer_reviews.author: V

customer_reviews.title: Smells great, awesome for foot baths.
customer_reviews.text: I like it very much, it smells great, and leaves my feet very soft after foot baths.
customer_reviews.author: Oa

customer_reviews.title: Love This
customer_reviews.text: I love this product !! It smells like fresh coconut. Not like sun tan oil. And it make your skin feel very soft .will definitely buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Nanette

customer_reviews.title: Good!
customer_reviews.text: The smell is good and cannot beat the price at all. It would be even better if the smell can last a little bit longer.
customer_reviews.author: Wayne

customer_reviews.title: Allergic reaction
customer_reviews.text: Really bad allergic reaction to this. Hives all over my body and chest pain tightness. Maybe the fragrances they use
customer_reviews.author: Grace N.

customer_reviews.title: Smells amazing and very moisturizing
customer_reviews.text: This stuff smells amazing but not overpowering. Very moisturizing! Using this for calming bath for kids. They love the scent!
customer_reviews.author: Joy-Marie S.

customer_reviews.title: STRONG smell
customer_reviews.text: This has a VERY strong smell! Probly won't order this particular fragrance again, but am always pleased with tree hut products
customer_reviews.author: sarah

customer_reviews.title: Small package, big results
customer_reviews.text: This is a really nice product. I use epsom salt all the time and take baths daily. This is my favorite Epsom salt, the smell is nice and it feels good to my skin.
customer_reviews.author: Susann

customer_reviews.title: Smells like a tropical retreat
customer_reviews.text: The smell is amazing and will leave your bathroom smelling wonderful for hours. It smells like a tropical spa resort. It turns your bath into a tropical retreat!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great smell!!
customer_reviews.text: My doctor recommended epsom salt for muscle aches and fatigue. I LOVE taking them as often as possible now! Love the scent and the way my skin feels. It also helps with the pain from fibromyalgia.
customer_reviews.author: Pen Name

customer_reviews.title: Shea softens skin & light summery smell
customer_reviews.text: This smells so good and leaves your skin very soft plus helps your muscles. You can even add additional essential oils if you want.
customer_reviews.author: Shelby19

customer_reviews.title: Smells amazing!
customer_reviews.text: These salts smell sooo good! It is by far my favorite! I wish it came in a bigger size. I will be buying again.
customer_reviews.author: Katie

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: This salt makes a great soak. Other scents by this brand need oil added for moisture, but this one is great without any additions.
customer_reviews.author: PostScripts

customer_reviews.title: A great pick among many
customer_reviews.text: We love the scent. It was nice to receive the product in a ziplock bag to keep the mess to a minimum. Our skin was smooth and moisturized after use.
customer_reviews.author: Derek

customer_reviews.title: Best Bath Salts
customer_reviews.text: Smells amazing , I have bought this item like 3 times now. Recommend it to anyone who loves to take baths.
customer_reviews.author: Danielle Deck

customer_reviews.title: Moisturizing BUT Too strong of scent
customer_reviews.text: Feels good on my feet but the scent is way to strong for me. To the point that every time I use it, I get a headache from the smell.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: HEAVENLY
customer_reviews.text: Sooo soothing and relaxing to use in a foot bath . the next best thing to being at a spa!
customer_reviews.author: Nina Arbour

customer_reviews.title: Lovely Essence!
customer_reviews.text: This product's smell was lovely, however, the price exceeded it's value as an epsom salt.
customer_reviews.author: BABB

customer_reviews.title: It's all it says it is!
customer_reviews.text: This soaking salt is the bomb! It smells good and works accordingly in the bath tub. It also softens my skin!
customer_reviews.author: Sharon

customer_reviews.title: Love this stuff!
customer_reviews.text: I love this stuff! It smells amazing. The scent puts you in the mind of a beach day. Weird but I love the packaging too. It helps me relax & leaves my skin feeling soft. I'll definitely be buying again.
customer_reviews.author: prozacsmom

customer_reviews.title: Softer skin but did not ease the pain in my legs
customer_reviews.text: Smells quite nice (some say that the scent is too strong but I didn’t feel that way.) It’s quite fragrant, yes, but not bothersome. I am rating this product 3 stars because it didn’t help to soothe the pain in my legs. Otherwise, might be nice for a bath. It did make my skin feel nice.
customer_reviews.author: ReneeLynn

customer_reviews.title: Don't pay full price
customer_reviews.text: Product is okay. When the salts are put in the bath tub the smell is almost non existent. It dissolved pretty quickly. I got it on sale so it was worth what I paid, but would not pay full price for it.
customer_reviews.author: Laura Ballard

customer_reviews.title: This Is A Great Product For Personal Care!
customer_reviews.text: Was A Little Cautious At First, But The Product Proved Itself.Ultimately I'm Very Pleased With My Purchase.
customer_reviews.author: William q Caraway

customer_reviews.title: Smells Great!!
customer_reviews.text: When it first arrived it came busted and completely destroyed, I let amazon know and they immediately sent another. This smells amazing and perfect for baths and relaxation. I always use in every bath to calm the body down leaves my body feeling smooth. 10/10 recommend.
customer_reviews.author: alaya

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: I like this product. Smells good, like gummy bears. Makes my feet super soft in the foot spa.
customer_reviews.author: Kane

customer_reviews.title: Great value!
customer_reviews.text: Great value. The smell is wonderful and the dissolved very fast in the bath. I don't even need to use coconut oil in my bath because this provides enough.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Skaff

customer_reviews.title: Good value
customer_reviews.text: Heavy bag Very fragrent... potent. Does not smell like coconut or lime, but it is a tolerable, strong fragrence Packed inside another thin plastic bag for protection in shipping
customer_reviews.author: pen💮

customer_reviews.title: Soothing to skin
customer_reviews.text: Love these bath salts! Gentle on skin with a very light scent. Excellent price and I love my monthly delivery! Makes my life easier!!! Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Mrs. K

customer_reviews.title: smells divine!
customer_reviews.text: smells really good and super relaxing when put into a bath! not sure if it is very moisturizing but overall a great product!
customer_reviews.author: sitan

customer_reviews.title: . Better than regular boring Epsom salt.
customer_reviews.text: Bought this to soak my feet in. Works pretty well. Smells very nice. Better than regular boring Epsom salt.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff Connelly

customer_reviews.title: Smells good
customer_reviews.text: Smells really nice. My first time using epsom salt. I don’t know if this stuff is supposed to dissolve right away in water but I had to stir it up. It was ok, no remarkable healing
customer_reviews.author: TostadaJ.

customer_reviews.title: Nice scented salted bath for feet
customer_reviews.text: Has a soft scent. Left my feet soft and feeling moisturized after foot bath.
customer_reviews.author: Laveen

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful!
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE THIS! THUS works so well. So relaxing. It is like being in the spa!!
customer_reviews.author: Christi J.

customer_reviews.title: Smells divine!
customer_reviews.text: I have turned my entire family and friends onto this brand. The smell is so wonderful!!
customer_reviews.author: Twin Power 2017

customer_reviews.title: Smells great
customer_reviews.text: Love the smell of this stuff. It's also moisturizing. I mainly use it in my foot bath. Smell might be a little strong for some so I use half this and half of an unscented
customer_reviews.author: nancy k kramer

customer_reviews.title: Awesome product
customer_reviews.text: The small is amazing and it makes your feet fell very soft and smooth. I highly recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Luciana Todd

customer_reviews.title: Smells nice!
customer_reviews.text: Smells amazing! Use it for my feet after a long day and love it so far!
customer_reviews.author: Morgan

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful Scent
customer_reviews.text: This Epsom Salt brand smells wonderful! I use a few tablespoons in my foot spa. I don’t find it particularly moisturizing as I have to use body lotion on my feet after using it to keep them from feeling dry and tight.
customer_reviews.author: Joyflsong

customer_reviews.title: Smells Heavenly!
customer_reviews.text: The Shea product smells good enough to eat (but please don’t :-)). Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: x1ndigoChildx

product_meta.title: Tree Hut Shea Moisturizing Epsom Salt Coconut Lime, 3Ibs, Ultra Hydrating Epsom for Nourishing Essential Body Care
product_meta.description: Scent:Coconut LimeSoothe and soften your skin with Tree Hut Epsom Salt with the scent of Coconut Lime. This ultra moisturizing Epsom salt is formulated with Certified Shea Butter with Coconut Extract and Lime Extract to nourish and leave skin feeling touchably smooth. Relax, detox and fall in love with this deep soak to benefit your feet, hands, legs and all over body. The lush Coconut Lime scent will leave your skin smelling delightful. For the best experience, pour the salts into bath water when you have a sore foot, tired back muscles, or want to a have some amazing calm personal time!
feature_bullets: 100% PURE NATURAL SHEA BUTTER - Premium deep moisturizer that wonderfully softens and smooths dry cracked skin.
COCONUT EXTRACT AND LIME EXTRACT - Quality moisturizers that softens and smooths skin with the ideal fragrance for the senses.
PARABEN FREE - Absolutely no parabens or formaldehyde donors! Free of harmful chemicals for healthy skincare.
MADE IN THE USA - Proudly made in America by a world class professional cosmetics team in an American beauty lab.

specifications.Domestic Shipping: Currently, item can be shipped only within the U.S. and to APO/FPO addresses. For APO/FPO shipments, please check with the manufacturer regarding warranty and support issues.
specifications.International Shipping: This item can be shipped to select countries outside of the U.S.
